name: The name of a variable MUST be unique among the names of all variables defined within the same immediately enclosing scope.
description: The name of a variable MUST be unique among the names of all variables defined within the same immediately enclosing scope.
output:
Line and column for each violation 
Associated value => number of violations found
rationale: Compatible with CISQ 18 and especially ASCCSM-CWE-835
remediation: The name of a variable MUST be unique among the names of all variables defined within the same immediately enclosing scope.
